text: my name is Arman dogar and I'm one of

I originally worked at AWS uh back in

longtime fan longtime user of the

days of AWS and and certainly since
founding Hashi Corp a lot of what we've

one of the biggest impact of growing

has been at the Forefront of that in

think about the impacts of things like
infrastructure as code and and

based approaches to security and now I
think bringing an AI into the equation
it's how does generative AI impact the
way we manage infrastructure at scale so
as a longtime user user of AWS one of
the things we love is the way the AWS
helps us be more Nimble I think there's
a huge array of services and those let
us really be tailored in what we consume
and able to deliver business value to

one of the other things that AWS helps

one of our challenges is how do we
deliver our services and our
